languages.text: {n}Тело отказывается вам повиноваться: рукоять словно прилипла к ладоням, а взгляд демонического глаза, кажется, воспламеняет самую вашу душу.{/n} "Перечить самой судьбе — напрасно". {n}Вы кричите, чувствуя, как ваша душа исходит пеплом...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Тело отказывается вам повиноваться: рукоять словно прилипла к ладоням, а взгляд демонического глаза, кажется, воспламеняет самую вашу душу.{/n} "Перечить самой судьбе — напрасно". {n}Вы кричите, чувствуя, как ваша душа исходит пеплом...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your body refuses to obey your mind. The handle feels as if it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the daemonic eye sets your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тело отказывается вам повиноваться: рукоять словно прилипла к ладоням, а взгляд демонического глаза, кажется, воспламеняет самую вашу душу.{/n} "Перечить самой судьбе — напрасно". {n}Вы кричите, чувствуя, как ваша душа исходит пеплом...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your body refuses following your orders: the handle feels like it stuck to your palms, and the gaze of the demonic eye seems to ignite your very soul.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burning to the ashes...{/n}

{n}Your body refuses following your orders: the handle feels like it stuck to your palms, and the gaze of the demonic eye seems to ignite your very soul.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burning to the ashes...{/n}

{n}Your body refuses to obey your mind: the handle feels like it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the demonic eye seems to set your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}

{n}Your body refuses to obey your mind: the handle feels like it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the demonic eye seems to set your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}

{n}Your body refuses to obey your mind. The handle feels as if it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the daemonic eye sets your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的身体拒绝服从你的思想，剑柄仿佛已经与你的双手融为一体，恶魔之眼的注视几乎要将你的灵魂点燃。{/n}“抗拒命运是徒劳之举。”{n}你尖叫着，感觉你的灵魂仿佛要被烧成灰烬……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body refuses to obey your mind. The handle feels as if it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the daemonic eye sets your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的身体拒绝服从你的思想，剑柄仿佛已经与你的双手融为一体，恶魔之眼的注视几乎要将你的灵魂点燃。{/n}“抗拒命运是徒劳之举。”{n}你尖叫着，感觉你的灵魂仿佛要被烧成灰烬……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre corps refuse de vous obéir. La poignée de la lame semble ne faire qu'une avec votre main et le regard démoniaque vous brûle jusqu'au plus profond de votre âme.{/n} « Il est futile de tenter de résister à votre destin. » {n}Vous hurlez tandis que votre âme est réduite en cendres...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body refuses to obey your mind. The handle feels as if it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the daemonic eye sets your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre corps refuse de vous obéir. La poignée de la lame semble ne faire qu'une avec votre main et le regard démoniaque vous brûle jusqu'au plus profond de votre âme.{/n} « Il est futile de tenter de résister à votre destin. » {n}Vous hurlez tandis que votre âme est réduite en cendres...{/n}

languages.text: {n}身体が頭の言うことを聞かない…柄はさながら手と一体化したかのようで、悪魔の眼差しが魂を燃え上がらせる。{/n}「運命に抵抗するのは無駄だ」{n}魂が燃えて灰燼と化すのを感じて、あなたは叫び声を上げた…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body refuses to obey your mind. The handle feels as if it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the daemonic eye sets your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}身体が頭の言うことを聞かない…柄はさながら手と一体化したかのようで、悪魔の眼差しが魂を燃え上がらせる。{/n}「運命に抵抗するのは無駄だ」{n}魂が燃えて灰燼と化すのを感じて、あなたは叫び声を上げた…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu cuerpo se niega a obedecer a tu mente. Parece que la empuñadura es parte de tu mano y la mirada del ojo daemónico hace arder tu alma.{/n} «Es inútil resistirse al destino». {n}Entre gritos, sientes que tu alma se incinera...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body refuses to obey your mind. The handle feels as if it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the daemonic eye sets your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu cuerpo se niega a obedecer a tu mente. Parece que la empuñadura es parte de tu mano y la mirada del ojo daemónico hace arder tu alma.{/n} «Es inútil resistirse al destino». {n}Entre gritos, sientes que tu alma se incinera...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Körper weigert sich, deinem Verstand zu gehorchen: Der Griff fühlt sich an, als sei er mit deinen Händen verschmolzen, und der Blick des dämonischen Auges steckt deine Seele in Brand.{/n} "Es ist zwecklos, sich Eurem Schicksal zu widersetzen." {n}Du schreist, als du spürst, wie deine Seele zu Asche verbrennt ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body refuses to obey your mind. The handle feels as if it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the daemonic eye sets your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}

{n}Dein Körper weigert sich, deinem Verstand zu gehorchen: Der Griff fühlt sich an, als sei er mit deinen Händen verschmolzen, und der Blick des dämonischen Auges scheint deine Seele in Flammen zu setzen.{/n} "Es ist zwecklos, sich Eurem Schicksal zu widersetzen." {n}Du schreist, als du spürst, wie deine Seele zu Asche verbrennt ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bedenin, aklına itaat etmeyi reddediyor. Sanki sapla elin bir olmuş gibi hissediyorsun. İblis gözünün bakışı, ruhunu yakıyor.{/n} "Kaderine direnmen boşuna." {n}Ruhunun yanıp kül olduğunu hissedip çığlık atıyorsun...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body refuses to obey your mind. The handle feels as if it has become one with your hands, and the gaze of the daemonic eye sets your very soul ablaze.{/n} "Resisting your fate is futile." {n}You scream as you feel your soul burn away to ash...{/n}
